scripts.pre:deploy: cd ./server && eb init --platform 'Node.js 14 running on 64bit Amazon Linux 2' --region 'us-east-1' 'storefront-backend-api'
scripts.set:env: cd ./server && eb setenv AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=$AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=$AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY BCRYPT_PASSWORD=$BCRYPT_PASSWORD NODE_ENV=$NODE_ENV PORT=$PORT POSTGRES_DB=$POSTGRES_DB POSTGRES_HOST=$POSTGRES_HOST POSTGRES_PASSWORD=$POSTGRES_PASSWORD POSTGRES_TEST_DB=$POSTGRES_TEST_DB POSTGRES_USER=$POSTGRES_USER SALT_ROUNDS=$SALT_ROUNDS TOKEN_SECRET=$TOKEN_SECRET
scripts.angular:deploy: cd ./client &&  aws s3 cp --recursive --acl public-read ./dist s3://storefront-frontend/
